name: hhlm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(chli, cres(cfv(clm, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(chli, cres(cfv(clm, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn)))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cims, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmopn, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ ~~>v =((~~>t ` c0)|`(~H[↦]ℕ))
⊣ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
⊣ c1 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ c2 =(IndMet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(MetOpen ` c2)
